title: Fluted Pumpkin (Ugwu)
description: A popular vegetable in Nigerian cuisine, rich in vitamins and minerals, grown sustainably in our local fields.

title: Jute Leaves (Ewedu)
description: A staple in West African soups, known for its unique texture and health benefits, harvested fresh from our farm.

title: Clove Basil (Efirin)
description: An aromatic herb, also known as Scent Leaf, used for its unique flavor in traditional dishes and grown year-round.

title: Water Leaf (Gbure)
description: A versatile green used in salads and soups, packed with nutrients and grown in our hydroponic towers.

title: Habanero & Shepherd Peppers
description: A mix of spicy and sweet peppers, perfect for adding a kick to any dish, grown in our greenhouse.

title: Lemongrass & Calaloo
description: Aromatic lemongrass and leafy calaloo, essential ingredients in Caribbean and African cooking.
